name: The Forgotten Forest V0.3
description:
The Forgotten Forest is a game where you play as a person that crashes into a forest where no one lives anymore. With nothing around for miles you must find a way to get help and leave!

This is my first project on Unity and hope you all have fun and enjoy!

New Version Available! With the new Version V 0.3:

  • CHECKPOINT SYSTEM!!!
    • the long awaited checkpoint system has been made and will now let you go through the game and not be rushed to play it all in one run!                                         
  • Fixed bugs with ghosts                                                                                                                                    
  • Fixed bugs with items and notes around maps                                                                                 
  • Other bug fixes to help improve the gameplay experience!! 

Thank you everyone!
